content:
Welcome to Mini 1130, A Fishbowl Invasion by Ninja Monkeys!

Moderated by: Enigma

It was just a harmless prank you know?
A couple of seniors drunk off cheap alcohol pulling a few practical jokes. But you really didn't like walking around with your eyebrows shaved off.

You knew it would take time to devise a devilishly clever plan for revenge. And you meretriciously planned it over the following years.

It took you time to save up, but finally you did it and you had enough money to buy a holiday to Africa. It would be dangerous and unforgiving but you knew the success of your master plan relied on it. With care and diligence, you stuffed some baby monkeys into your underwear and smuggled them back home.

Over the years you raised them as your own, pumping them with steroids and brainwashing them with your propaganda.

Finally. Their time was due. And not a moment too late. You were ready. Your Ninja Monkey's were ready. You would deliver a swift and stunning blow, one which would cripple your enemies forever, and teach the world never to mess with you again. And they would never see it coming.

You instructed your monkeys to proceed to destroy their target. It was a target of utmost significance. Losing it would shatter their pride and hope.

Their pet goldfishes had to die.

Rules
All site wide rules apply, unless explicitly specified.

1. General Etiquette
a) Mafia is a game. Enjoy yourself! Being respectful will ensure other people also enjoy the game.
b) I do not mind mild personal attacks against another player. But if the other player requests you to stop, cease that type of behavior immediately.
c) You have been given a win condition. You are expected to play towards that win condition.
d) I am human, I can make mistakes. It is my first time modding. Please inform me if I do.
e) If you would like me to notice something in game, please post it in the format Mod: Hi! or I may miss it.
f) Please do not post in the game if you are not a player.
g) I reserve the right to change or update any rules.

2. Communication
a) Do not discuss this game outside of this thread unless explicitly specified.
b) Do not quote your role PM or any moderator related communications. Paraphrasing is acceptable. Don't push it.
c) If you die, you are permitted one "bah" post with no game related content.
d) If you die, you will be given access to a dead quicktopic. Do not share this link with anyone.
e) Do not use any invisible/hard to read text or cryptography.
f) If you have the ability to edit you posts, don't. I will gladly edit any minor mistakes if you request it.
g) Mod posts will be in bold purple. Please do not use this color.
h) Flavor is provided purely for your entertainment purposes. I reserve the right to be lazy and not provide any flavor at all.
i) Scum may use their quicktopic for 48 hours once role PM's have been sent or until day 1 begins, which ever is longer.
j) All night actions must be submitted by PM as stated in your role PM, or they will not count.
k) Do not post if the thread is open if the mod has declared a lynch/opening scene is incoming.

3. Voting
a) Votes must be bolded, at the start of a line. I take no responsibility if your vote is not acknowledged if it is camouflaged in a wall of text.
b) Unvotes are nice but are not necessary.
c) Do not abuse voting to intentionally mislead other players. This includes fake hammers and such.
d) Abbreviations are acceptable as long as it is obvious who you are referring to.
e) A lynch occurs when a majority is reached. For an odd number of players, this is (n+1)/2. For an even number of players, this is (n/2)+1.
f) Posting is allowed in twilight, between the time a hammer is delivered and when I waltz in and kill the poor person.
g) Votes posted after the deadline has elapsed will not be counted.
h) If no majority is reached by the deadline, a No Lynch will occur.
i) You may vote for No Lynch. It requires a majority minus one votes to happen unless the game is in LYLO where it will require majority votes.
j) Votes by a player being replaced are defaulted to not voiting upon the replacement's arrival.

4. Deadlines and Activity
a) Day 1 will be 3 weeks. All subsequent days will have deadlines of 2 weeks.
b) Night 1 will have a maximum deadline of 72 hours and minimum deadline of 36 hours. All subsequent nights will have a minimum deadline of 24 hours, and maximum deadline of 48 hours.
c) You may request a deadline extension, it will require at least half of the majority of living players (minimum 2 players) to agree. Each extension will be no longer than 72 hours.
d) I may grant deadline extensions at my own discretion depending on the game situation, and replacements as such.
e) I reserve the right to shorten deadlines if game activity is minimal.
f) If no night actions are submitted by the time the maximum deadline expires, you will forfeit your action.
g) All night actions follow the Natural Action Resolution system unless otherwise specified.
h) Please aim to post at least every 48 hours. You will receive a prod if you do not post within a 72 hour interval. You have 24 hours to respond to the prod via in-game post (or PM if thread locked) before you are replaced.
i) You will be automatically replaced if you receive 3 prods, or 2 prods in the same game day.
j) Please announce all V/LA's in thread or via PM. I will keep track of all V/LA's in vote counts.

5. Consequences
a) Minor rule infringements will result in a private warning.
b) Major or continued rule infringements will result in a modkill or force replacement.
c) If you are modkilled you will be turned into a Neutral Survivor and auto lossed.
d) Being force replaced or modkilled for any reasons (including inactivity) will result in future blacklistings from my games.

Sample Role PM's
You know there exists at least 1 of each of the roles below.

Vanilla Townie RoleHi there Player!

Welcome to Mini 1130, A Fishbowl Invasion by Ninja Monkeys.

It seems you will have to rely on your wits and guts to find these Ninja Monkeys and rid your fishbowl community of these foul primates!

You are a Vanilla Townie.

During the day, you have one vote which you can use to further your agenda.
Unfortunately for you, you have no active nor passive abilities, bad luck!

Active Abilities: None
Passive Abilities: None
Win Condition: You win when all the Ninja Monkeys have been evicted from your fishbowl.

Confirm via game post.
Good Luck!

Mafia Traitor RoleHi there Player!

Welcome to Mini 1130, A Fishbowl Invasion by Ninja Monkeys.

It seems you will have to rely on your cunning and deception abilities to eliminate the fishbowl community of all the goldfish!

You are a Mafia Traitor.

During the day, you have one vote which you can use to further your agenda.

Active Abilities: *removed*
Passive Abilities: You will be provided with a link to The Temple (scum night chat) if you are successfully targeted with Recruit. You may use this chat from the following night onwards.
Team Abilities: You may discuss in The Temple (if you have access) with your team mates on one player whom you wish to Night Kill, and have the person who will be performing the action to PM me with the target.
Win Condition: You win when all the Ninja Monkeys have a majority of alive players or if nothing can prevent the same. The traitor counts towards the majority, regardless if he is recruited or not.

Ninja Training
*removed*

Note: You may only perform one ability (active and team), unless you are the only member of the Mafia team remaining with access to The Temple.
Note: You will not be able to perform night kills if you have not been successfully targeted with Recruit if you are the only member of the Mafia team remaining.

Confirm via game post.
Good Luck!

Votecount 1.0Someone had tried to warn this blissful fishbowl community of an impending attack by mutant ninja monkeys. This was serious business.

Preperations had been made, ideas sought and readiness was at a maximum. Then all you goldfishes remembered you had a 3 second memory so they all resorted to repeating "Imminent attack by crazy mutant ninja monkeys, ready the defenses!" as a constant reminder to yourselves.

Unfortunately that phrase took longer than 3 seconds to repeat, so by the time you had all finished the phrase, no one had any idea about what the beginning of the phrase was. So you all went back to your usual lackluster daily routines of swimming around in circles. Something bad was about to happen, and the whole community were sitting ducks.

So after the shenanigans fun, joy, happiness, laughter and puppies of the previous day, it was decided that a well earned rest for everyone was in order.

So while all the goldfish pondered how to close their non-existent eyelids for some relaxing shut-eye, the remaining donkeys were plotting their vengeance.

They considered stabbing them to death with a banana, but in a world of poverty and starving children, such a waste of food would be sacrilege.

The proven method of asphyxiation by farting could have been used, but that posed a few issues...

The Greenhouse effect. The methane from farting posed a significant risk to increasing global warming. They were not eco-terrorists, and were avid supporters of the Kyoto Protocol. That was one minor inconvenience.

Then there was the issue of resources. It would be a challenge for a handful of asses to be able to sustain a production of fart gases enough to asphyxiate their target. So obviously now, this method of murder was now out of the question.

Ahh! They had a brain wave! And they thanked the heavens for blessing them with a higher IQ than those pathetic goldfish.

So unknown to the clueless goldfish who were still figuring out how to get some shut eye, they sneakily phoned the Climate Police Hotline to tip them off about the gross violations that had occurred during the death of Akira.

And in a hail of sirens, the Climate Police arrived in their solar powered submarines. Eager to get back to their donuts and hotdogs, they attempted to arrest the first suspect they saw, [winger]. Of course, [winger] resisted arrest, and they were left with no option but to pepper spray him. But without eyelids, and hence the inability to close them, the pain drove [winger] crazy causing him to gouge his own eyeballs out. Opps.

Lynch has been reached!

It seemed everyone had differing opinions on the best way to resolve this crisis. They thought team bonding actives would help relieve the bottled up hate.

So grudgingly, everyone decided to participate in a charades night. That didn't work too well because the actor kept on forgetting what phrase they were trying to perform while the players just abused the actor for their horrendous acting skills. It kinda made things worse.

Synchronized swimming was the next activity they decided to try. Unfortunately that too turned out to be a complete failure. Once seeing some of the townspeople in their swimming outfits which highlighted their ugliness sexiness which was usually well masked by everyday clothing, many ran straight to the toilet to throw up, which unfortunately was perceived as an insult. So the emotions flared once again.

Meanwhile, Cecily continued to disagree with the general consensus of team bonding, and decided to take her own approach to the issue. She had heard of the saying, ignorance is bliss, and now would be the perfect opportunity to test this.

And with that thought, she began forging her new identity, Ceily the Seal, complete with plastic surgery and all. She had prepared a test run and was adamant no one would be able to recognize her, and therefore she could forgo all the problems in the community and hopefully live in blissful, if not naive peace.

However, the society consumed with rage of the death of [winger] had decided a new approach to soothe the issue on hand. What better way to release all the locked up anger than to release it?

And then someone noticed a cute little seal bouncing around the fishbowl. It seemed the stars had aligned and the heavens had delivered this gift to all, knowing it would help ease the crisis. So they all raced home to find their clubs.

A few minutes later, it seemed they were all honorary members of the Seal Cub Clubbing Club ... well everyone except for Cecily who was nowhere to be found.

Cecily, Vanilla Townie, killed Day 2.

Subsequent nights after night 1 last for a minimum of 24 hours and maximum of 48 hours. Any submitted night action changes after 24 hours may not be considered. Please submit any night actions by PM before the deadline.
Night ends Tuesday, 3:00pm GMT+10.30.

Shaken with fear by the lawlessness off the previous night, all the goldfish were struggling to comprehend what might happen tonight. Were they next to die?

Meanwhile, the monkeys, taken aback by the ruthlessness of the killing of one of their own shuddered in the thought of the coming days. They could be next to die...

So the goldfish thought it would be wise to take some defensive action. And the idea to hire a bodyguard to protect them was put in motion. Unfortunately, the sorrow of the death of now two of their friends had caused many of them to revert back to their alcoholic ways in an attempt to relieve the burden. With all their life savings spent on cheap goon, they were penniless and it seemed they would have to improvise.

And when the master of the ninja monkeys discovered that they had let one of their own die, he was consumed with rage. He cut all their weekly pocket money, so now the monkeys were without a cent. It would be a challenge to kill with no money, actually near impossible. Maybe someone else could do their dirty work for them... So some improvisation was necessary.

And the next day on pokemonXXX.com, two brand new classifieds appeared.

"A school Magikarp is looking for a Gyrados to dominate them. Requires someone with vivid imagination and wild tendencies! xxx <3.
Please email ninjamonkeys69(at)gmail.com"

"Lonely Magikarp seeks an aggressive Gyrados for some naughty adventures. Being strong and fearsome are very admirable and attractive traits. xoxo <3.
Call 1800Fish69 any time after 3pm."

Reading the classifieds of pokemonXXX.com that morning was Team Rocket looking for their next poor Pokemon to exploit. With the global financial crisis, they too were victims of budget cuts. Their lack of funding meant their pet cat, Meowth hadn't had a feed for several days, they could barely even feed themselves...

And those two ads immediately caught their attention. Magikarp were very valuable and rare after all if they recalled correctly, which must meant they were a delicacy. And how convenient, after contacting both parties, they were at the same location. Perfect.

They immediately departed to the fishbowl community with their "Old Rods" all prepared. The fish were so plentiful here, it would be like shooting fish in a barrel, a walk in the park.

And almost immediately they had their first catch. Meowth was dying for a feed, and was exuberant! But that was weird, this Magikarp had four legs and a tail ... it actually looked more like a monkey. Meowth took one nibble ... it tasted like monkey too. Meowth no like monkeys, he want fish. So back in the fishbowl this weird Magikarp went.

Their second catch was much more successful. It wasn't exactly a Magikarp, but hey it looked like a fish. And tasted like one too.

Meowth would have a feast tonight.

Maemuki wouldn't though. How unfortunate.

Maemuki, Town Watcher, killed Night 2.

Day 3 begins now!

Lynch has been reached!

Some drank to celebrate a successful lynching, others drank to drown their sorrows of good friends who were no longer with them. But they were bored, and alcohol seemed like something to kill the time.

Being drunk was a curious effect, it seemed to numb some pain, yet highlight the successes.

Only, nearly everyone forgot that they didn't have the ability to urinate. Riceballtail in her drunken stupor decided to try anyways, but seemed to fail to grasp the general concept of using a toilet. She attempted to try to sit on the toilet, but amazingly enough forgot to put the toilet seat down. As a result, she was stuck backside first in the toilet, but really didn't seem to want to attempt to get out, and decided to take a little nap instead.

And it seemed the perfect opportunity had arisen. The goldfish had spent all day debating on who to eliminate, and with Riceballtail in such a vulnerable position, who could resist such a temptation. And to top it off, it would be a story they could tell their grand-kids one day, if they managed to remember it.

So they flushed the toilet. Possibly after tending to their digestive systems needs first ... water was precious here after all, and it would be shameful to waste a flush.

And down went Riceballtail to discover where everything that is flushed down the toilet goes.

Riceballtail, Vanilla Townie, Killed Day 3.

Night ends Wednesday, 12:30pm 16th March, GMT +10.30.

Parama had been bullied as a baby monkey, and now as a fully grown monkey, the same tormentors were still griefing him.

He had tried everything to make them stop, the adults laughed at him and participated in the tormenting, and every time he cried, the bullying intensified. He couldn't withstand much more. He had no choice but to exile himself from the rest of the monkey community.

But he had been brainwashed by his master, and he knew he still had a goal to accomplish, but he would just do it without the help of the others.

Exiling himself from everyone else matured him into a new ape, and his determination higher than ever. He would train and punish his body to the extremes, so no one from his old monkey community would ever dare to mock him again, and he alone would be strong enough to conquer the feat his master had set. And maybe they would build a statue of him and worship him too, or he could also intimate them into doing so... what ever works.

His training was relentless, and his muscles developed accordingly. A body like this would shame Mr. Schwarzenegger.

But unfortunately, he was all grunt no brains. He forgot one important fact ... muscle doesn't float.

So he sank to the bottom of the fishbowl, all alone ... in the darkness ... no one cared. And there he passed on (by drowning of course).

Parama, Mafia Traitor, killed Night 3.

Day 4 begins now!

There was fairy bread, cookies, punch amongst a whole table full of delights.

Everyone all ate, drank and laughed merrily.

Maybe it was time to play some games, games were always fun.

Crazypianist1116 failed at understanding the concept of the game and spent a good few minutes trying to pin the tail on own tail.

Seemed like a good point to stop playing this game.

Took a few attempts but finally they were whacking this pinata with all their might ... but no candy was falling out!!! So they whacked it even harder, and harder and harder.
But there was still no candy!! Then the horror on everyone's face..... It wasn't a pinata.

Stupid Oso, he had meant to come to the party dressed as a pirate but got confused, and accidentally dressed up as a pinata instead.

He crawled up in his bed, and sobbed quietly to himself. He turned on "The greatest hits of Justin Bieber" and proceeded to cry himself to sleep.

Meanwhile, the monkeys themselves were feeling the pressure. They had nearly completed their goal, but they were exhausted. They needed something motivational. So they decided they would requisition Justin Bieber for a private concert, just a small treat for themselves for having gotten this far, and to motivate them to finish their task.

But the paparazzi quickly got hold of these rumors. Alas, the monkeys' quiet little event was about to be ruined...
"Justin Bieber rumored to be playing this weekend in The Fishbowl"

And all his crazy fan girls were far from impressed. They would allow nothing to stand in between them and their undying love for Justin Bieber. And the masses of fan girls marched to The Fishbowl.

The first house they reached was TwistedSpoon's. They could hear Justin Bieber's captivating voice coming from inside the house. he must be in there, how convenient! And with that, they all rushed inside eager to see Bieber for themselves.

Unfortunately, TwistedSpoon was crushed to death in this stampede. And the deadly Bieber fever has taken its next victim.

It was just like a scene from a cheesy horror flick.

Three unsuspecting souls. Alone, scared and praying for a miracle to come along and save them from this nightmare.
And the schools of dead goldfish, and the occasional floating monkey, in this gloomy fishbowl testified just how grim the situation was for them. At least the stench of the rotting corpses served as an occasional distraction.

Time to try for a more blunt approach to get them out of this dire situation, and they were rescued from their impasse of ideas when some Lady GaGa came on. Russian roulette would serve as an awesome finale. As no one had a gun, Bub volunteered a banana he was carrying instead. And with GaGa in a pokadot bikini providing the background atmosphere, they began this game of life and death.

As the banana spinning came to a stop, one end was pointing at DemonHybrid, the other at AGar. And without having defined which end was the barrel, they began bickering again.

Meanwhile, Bub pulled out his chopsticks and began eating some sushi (cause you know ninjas are like Asian) while having a fantasy watching Lady GaGa who was now wearing something only imagination can describe, oblivious to the fact that AGar and DemonHybrid were ready to kill each other. After he ran out of sushi, he decided to pick his nose and play with his navel a bit to pass the time. And AGar and DemonHybrid were still, eagerly awaiting Bub's input, who was now pre-occupied trying to chase his brown tail, as to who he thought was the ninja monkey.

AGar, unable to cope with the stress declared he was mentally insane, and went and sat in the corner of a round room. DemonHybrid was now convinced that AGar was indeed the ninja monkey.

After finally catching his tail, Bub suddenly finally realized that he now had the perfect opportunity. And his ninja close combat training would finally see some use.
So he stabbed AGar in the eyes (one chopstick in each eye .. perfect). It seemed he had finally emerged victorious, by his own skill and determination, and had no one to thank but himself.

AGar, Vanilla Townie, killed Day 6.

Game over. Congratulations to the winning team.

Hindsight again, but in this game, that should have been the exact wrong thing to do.

2 men down to 1 man after the lynch and it is N1. If you(Bub in this case) are tagged by a cop(gunsmith/thief type roles could be just as damning as well), then no help for that as there is nothing that can be done.

You can however, minimize your exposure to other PR types by not killing.

Watcher: Probably will be (and was in this game) watching the most visible target. BAD if you kill that target.

Tracker: Tracks you to the kill (if the tracker targets you[Bub]) BAD if you kill winger. Still bad, but not automatically fatal, if he tracks you to a recruit candidate as nothing is going to happen to that person. There is wiggle room if the tracker calls you out as to why you were moving about at night especially if the target of your night action doesn't die.

This game it does cast some suspicion because we know there is a traitor and mafia can be targeting someone in a non-lethal manner BUT you have a decent range of town PRs you can claim to cover for moving around.

When I created this setup I had a few things in mind, keep in mind that this made when minis were 12p, we just decided to add another VT.

Mafia have a ridiculous win rate in mini normals, I wanted a challenging game for mafia.
I didn't want the boring roleblocker on the mafia team. It's a joke when townies claim PR, it's just lolprblock haha, I wanted them to work around it.
I didn't want games where all the mafia lurk and avoid getting attention to themselves, hence the role of the traitor.
I wanted mafia to think about their night actions with great consequences for failing (derp), being able to kill the traitor adds a degree of complexity to how they should play.

There were three watchers in the game.
I made the traitor a watcher too, to give the town watcher some protection in the game. As the scum know the traitor is a watcher, they should be hesitant to kill it right away. Instead this adds another layer of complexity into night actions with multiple people possibly targetting the watcher for various reasons.
Two watchers is very strong, but we had to take into account the possibility of multiple counter claims. Not only could this expose most of the town PR's, town could mislynch several times if they didn't believe the claim, while also making the task of the scum's play much more difficult.

Finally, I despise having such a boring setup like cop, doc, roleblocker, godfather or some close variant of that. I wanted something different, something exciting for players to play.

I hope you guys understand a bit of what I wanted with this setup. I think it was balanced in a sense, but still had quite a swingy component to it, but players had much more control as to how swingy it was.

I'm surprised scum won after how the game played out earlier. I actually sent a sad PM to Hoopla all sad after N1, when I realized bub had been caught by the watcher since the traitor can't NK unless recruited, as I didn't really expect scum to be down D1 and D2, with her responding games need to be designed for extremes, taking into account multiple bad coincidences.

@Bub, I think your night play could have been much more thoughtful.
I mean you like killed your traitor, tried to recruit a claimed VT (when I specifically said traitor is a watcher comeon....), nor was I a fan of the kill on winger, pretty obvious and thoughtless night thinking there and easy to outguess. But then you won out at LYLO, so not a bad job overall.
FYI, you received one guilty from Mae, and nearly another one from Sundy with your kill on twistedspoon.... why didn't you kill the claimed watcher???

Finally, the dead QT is a very good read, I strongly suggest anyone who doesn't have access to it and wishes to enlighten themselves a bit PM me asking for the link.

Maybe more to come later. Ciao.
